key_risks: Material cost volatility due to fluctuations in asphalt, fuel, and raw material prices
Labor shortages impacting project timelines and costs
Dependence on government contracts making the company vulnerable to shifts in public spending
controversies: Class-action lawsuit alleging the creation of a liability shield for senior executives
Recent insider selling by a director raising questions about management's confidence
environmental_issues: Significant investment and operational adjustments required to achieve net-zero carbon emissions by 2050
social_issues: Ongoing labor challenges in the construction industry
governance_issues: Governance concerns due to the class-action lawsuit and insider trading activity

sources.title: Construction Partners Sued on Liability Shield Pushed by Backers
sources.snippet: An investor sued Construction Partners Inc., challenging its alleged move to create a liability shield for senior executives based on an investor vote dominated by insiders with conflicts of interest. The proposed class action follows similar cases brought against Fox Corp. and Snap Inc.
